dynaForm.PROCESS: SELECT PROCESS.PRO_UID AS UID, CONTENT.CON_VALUE AS VALUE FROM PROCESS, CONTENT WHERE (PROCESS.PRO_UID=CONTENT.CON_ID AND PROCESS.PRO_STATUS!='DISABLED' AND CONTENT.CON_CATEGORY='PRO_TITLE' AND CONTENT.CON_LANG='en') ORDER BY CONTENT.CON_VALUE ProcessAllProcesoProcessoTodos
dynaForm.TASKS: SELECT TASK.TAS_UID AS TUID, CONTENT.CON_VALUE AS TVALUE FROM TASK LEFT JOIN PROCESS ON (PROCESS.PRO_UID=TASK.PRO_UID) LEFT JOIN CONTENT ON (TASK.TAS_UID=CONTENT.CON_ID AND CONTENT.CON_CATEGORY='TAS_TITLE' AND CONTENT.CON_LANG='en') WHERE TASK.PRO_UID=@@PROCESS ORDER BY CONTENT.CON_VALUE TasksAllTareasTarefasTodas
